member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.IdentityModel.Client.Caching.DiscoveryCache
member.summary: Defines a cache used by . Only successful responses are cached and they expire, by default, after 1 day.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.IdentityModel.Client.Caching.DiscoveryCache.GetResponse(Primavera.Hydrogen.IdentityModel.Client.Endpoints.DiscoveryEndpoint)
member.summary: Gets the response obtained from the specified endpoint from the cache.
member.returns: The discovery document response retrieved from the cache. Null it is not in cache.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.IdentityModel.Client.Caching.DiscoveryCache.SetResponse(Primavera.Hydrogen.IdentityModel.Client.Endpoints.DiscoveryEndpoint,Primavera.Hydrogen.IdentityModel.Client.Messages.DiscoveryDocumentResponse)
member.summary: Sets the response obtained from the specified endpoint in the cache.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.IdentityModel.Client.Caching.TokenCache
member.summary: Defines a cache used by . Only successful responses are cached and they expire, by default, after 12 hours or when the access token is itself expired.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.IdentityModel.Client.Caching.TokenCache.GetResponse(Primavera.Hydrogen.IdentityModel.Client.Messages.TokenRequest)
member.summary: Gets the response obtained with the specified request from the cache.
member.returns: The token response retrieved from the cache. Null it is not in cache.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.IdentityModel.Client.Caching.TokenCache.SetResponse(Primavera.Hydrogen.IdentityModel.Client.Messages.TokenRequest,Primavera.Hydrogen.IdentityModel.Client.Messages.TokenResponse)
member.summary: Sets the response obtained with the specified request in the cache.

member.summary: Defines the interface of a token client. A token client allows retrieving OpenID Connect tokens.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.IdentityModel.Client.ITokenClient.GetClientCredentialsTokenAsync(System.String,Primavera.Hydrogen.IdentityModel.Client.TokenClientOptions,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Requests a token for the client credentials grant type from the specified token endpoint.
member.param: The token endpoint address. If the address points to the authority server base address, discovery will be triggered to determine the actual token endpoint address.
The options that should be used by the client, including the client identifier and client secret.
member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation. The token response.

member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation. The token response.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether all endpoints should be validated checked to belong to the authority. Defaults to true.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether HTTPS is required on all endpoints. Defaults to true.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether HTTP is allowed on loop-back addresses. Defaults to true.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a key set is required. Defaults to true.
